title: One Piece Episode #580 Anime Review
author: The Fandom Post
description: A detailed review of episode 580 praising the dragon fight and team dynamics. The review notes that Luffy uses his post-timeskip abilities and the superheated nature he can take on to land good blows against the dragon. The reviewer found the fight a lot of fun to watch and appreciated how the team worked together during the encounter.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Review discusses events from episode 580 only

title: ZORO KILLS VEGAPUNK'S DRAGON! One Piece eps 580/581 Reaction
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A reaction video covering episodes 580 and 581, focusing on Zoro's epic moment decapitating Vegapunk's artificial dragon.

title: 579-580: 'Arriving! a Burning Island â€“ Punk Hazard!' and 'A Battle in the Heat! Luffy vs. the Giant Dragon!'
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A detailed blog post from a first-time One Piece watcher covering their reactions to episodes 579-580, including their impressions of the Punk Hazard arc beginning and the dragon battle.

title: One Piece (Punk Hazard Arc) - Groovygords
author: Groovygords
description: A podcast episode reviewing the Punk Hazard Arc as a whole, which includes discussion of episode 580 and the memorable dragon battle.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full Punk Hazard Arc review with spoilers through episode 625

title: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast - Episodes 625, 628-629: End of the Punk Hazard Arc
author: The Going Merry Podcast
description: A podcast episode discussing the conclusion of the Punk Hazard Arc, including retrospective analysis of key moments like the dragon battle in episode 580.

title: Volume One - E191: Punk Hazard Part 1 (One Piece Series Review)
author: Volume One Podcast
description: A comprehensive podcast review of the first part of the Punk Hazard arc covering manga chapters 654-677, which includes the events of episode 580.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Review of first half of Punk Hazard Arc

title: One Piece (Punk Hazard) Anime Review and Discussion
author: DoubleSama
description: A comprehensive written review and analysis of the Punk Hazard arc. The author notes that 'Punk Hazard wasn't exactly the best saga of One Piece' and ranks it as their least favorite after East Blue.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full Punk Hazard Arc review with complete arc spoilers

title: One Piece Episode 580 - A Battle in the Heat! Luffy vs. The Giant Dragon!
author: Toei Animation
